#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<climits>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
#define LL long long int
#define P(N) printf("%d\n",N);
#define S(N) scanf("%d",&N);
#define SL(N) scanf("%lld",&N);
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define pnl printf("\n");
#define FOR(i,a,b) for (i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define mem(a,val) memset(a,val,sizeof(a))
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a, int b){ int temp; while(b>0)	{ temp= b; b=a%b; a=temp;}	return a;}
int ar[100005],temp[100005];
int dp[100005][4];
// find LIS of length K
LL LISK(int K,int N)
{
    for(int i=0;i<N;i++)dp[i][1]=1;
    for(int k=2;k<=K;k++)
    {
        LL subseq[N+3]; // number of subseq ending at element i of length k, not necessary increasing
        memset(subseq,0,sizeof(subseq));
        for(int i=1;i<N;i++)
        {
            subseq[ar[i-1]]+= dp[i-1][k-1];
            for(int j=1;j<ar[i];j++)
            {
                dp[i][k]+=subseq[j];//cout<<subseq[j]<<" ";
            }
        }
        //for(int i=0;i<N;i++)cout<<dp[i][k]<<" ";pnl
    }
    LL ans=0;
    for(int i=0;i<N;i++)ans+=dp[i][K];
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
       #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
       //     freopen("C:\\Users\\hp pc\\Desktop\\input.txt", "r", stdin);
      #endif
      int i,j,t,N;
      S(N)
      int cnt=0;
      map<int,int>ma;
      for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
      {
            S(ar[i])
            //ar[i]=N-i;
            temp[i]=ar[i];
      }
      sort(temp,temp+N);
      for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
         if(ma.find(temp[i])==ma.end()){ cnt++;ma[temp[i]]=cnt;}
      for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        ar[i]= ma[ar[i]];
      i=0,j=N-1;
      while(i<j)
      {
          swap(ar[i],ar[j]); i++;j--;
      }
    //  for(int i=0;i<N;i++)cout<<ar[i]<<" "; pnl
      cout<<LISK(3,N)<<endl;
return 0;
}
